actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize payment for research and analysis with respect to the financing of Presidential election campaigns.

summary.text: Authorizes up to $115,000 from the Senate contingent fund for research into the financing of presidential election campaigns. Requires the submission of a report to the Committee on Rules and Administration by January, 1982.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize payment for research and analysis with respect to the financing of Presidential election campaigns.
